title: Espresso
description: A rich, concentrated shot of coffee with bold flavor and velvety crema.

title: Cappuccino
description: Equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and airy foam for a balanced, creamy taste.

title: Latte
description: Smooth espresso blended with plenty of steamed milk and a light topping of foam.

title: Iced Coffee
description: Freshly brewed coffee chilled and served over ice for a refreshing lift.

title: Mocha
description: A blend of espresso, chocolate, and steamed milk topped with whipped cream.

title: Macchiato
description: A bold espresso 'stained' with a small amount of silky milk foam.

title: Frappuccino
description: A sweet, blended coffee drink with ice, creaminess, and a dessert-like finish.

title: Americano
description: Espresso diluted with hot water for a smooth, lighter coffee flavor.

title: Flat White
description: Velvety microfoam poured over espresso for a creamy yet strong coffee taste.

title: Affogato
description: A scoop of vanilla ice cream ‘drowned’ with hot espresso—half dessert, half coffee.

title: Irish Coffee
description: Coffee mixed with Irish whiskey and topped with lightly whipped cream.

title: Cortado
description: Equal parts espresso and warm milk for a smooth, low-acidity drink.

title: Vienna Coffee
description: Strong coffee topped generously with whipped cream instead of milk.

title: Iced Latte
description: A chilled blend of espresso and cold milk poured over ice.

title: Nitro Cold Brew
description: Cold brew coffee infused with nitrogen for a creamy, frothy texture.

title: Ristretto
description: A shorter, more concentrated espresso shot with intense flavor.

title: Red Eye
description: Brewed coffee boosted with a shot of espresso for extra caffeine power.

title: Black Eye
description: Two shots of espresso added to drip coffee for maximum intensity.

title: Cafe au Lait
description: Brewed coffee mixed with warm steamed milk for a mild, smooth experience.

title: Iced Mocha
description: Chocolate, espresso, and cold milk shaken over ice—sweet and refreshing.

title: Cinnamon Latte
description: A classic latte infused with warm cinnamon spice.

title: Pumpkin Spice Latte
description: Espresso with pumpkin spice, steamed milk, and cozy seasonal flavors.

title: Caramel Macchiato
description: Steamed milk marked with espresso and drizzled with sweet caramel.

title: Iced Caramel Latte
description: Chilled espresso and milk enhanced with buttery caramel syrup.

title: Hazelnut Latte
description: A creamy latte sweetened with nutty hazelnut flavor.

title: Mocha Frappe
description: A blended chocolate-coffee drink with ice—smooth, sweet, and icy.

title: Vanilla Latte
description: A classic latte enriched with smooth, sweet vanilla syrup.

title: Iced Vanilla Latte
description: Cold milk and espresso poured over ice and flavored with vanilla.

title: Chai Latte
description: Spiced black tea mixed with steamed milk for a warm, aromatic drink.

title: Dirty Chai
description: A chai latte with a shot of espresso for a spiced caffeine kick.

title: Iced Chai Latte
description: Chilled, sweet chai tea mixed with cold milk and ice.

title: Matcha Latte
description: Japanese matcha green tea blended with steamed milk for earthy sweetness.

title: Iced Matcha Latte
description: Cool, refreshing matcha mixed with cold milk served over ice.

title: Black Coffee
description: Freshly brewed coffee served plain for pure, simple flavor.

title: Iced Black Coffee
description: Straight brewed coffee poured over ice—crisp and refreshing.

title: Mocha Latte
description: A latte combined with chocolate syrup for a sweet, rich twist.

title: Iced Mocha Latte
description: Cold milk, espresso, and chocolate served over ice for a cool treat.

title: Coconut Latte
description: A latte made with creamy coconut milk for a tropical touch.

title: Iced Coconut Latte
description: Coconut milk and espresso poured over ice—light and refreshing.

title: Almond Milk Latte
description: A plant-based latte featuring lightly nutty almond milk.

title: Iced Almond Latte
description: Chilled almond milk and espresso over ice for a smooth, dairy-free drink.

title: Honey Latte
description: A warm, soothing latte sweetened naturally with honey.

title: Iced Honey Latte
description: Cold milk, espresso, and honey blended into a lightly sweet iced drink.
